actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of State to make a grant of up to $500,000 to the International Institute for Strategic Studies for use in constructing a new headquarters building for that organization.

summary.text: Authorizes the appropriation of $500,000 for a grant by the Secretary of State to the International Institute for Strategic Studies to assist in headquarters construction.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of State to make a grant of up to $500,000 to the International Institute for Strategic Studies for use in constructing a new headquarters building for that organization.
